attributes.action: make sure that MPs once elected earn the public money paid to them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At least one MP has researched and written two histories while being an MP.  Are the duties of MPs so light that they can carry out academic research and publish books at the same time?  This would appear to be a clear waste of public money.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
